languages.text: Система Райкад обратилась в гнойник скверны, отравляющий Простор. Ирреальные энергии отверзшейся варп-язвы удерживали лишившиеся гравитационной хватки светила планеты в системе вопреки законам бытия. Великое отвращение поселилось на Райкаде Минорис, и извергалось оно в прочие системы охотно и злобно.

The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.
languages.original_text: Система Райкад обратилась в гнойник скверны, отравляющий Простор. Ирреальные энергии отверзшейся варп-язвы удерживали лишившиеся гравитационной хватки светила планеты в системе вопреки законам бытия. Великое отвращение поселилось на Райкаде Минорис, и извергалось оно в прочие системы охотно и злобно.

traits.locale_text: Rykad system turned into a purulent wound of taint, corrupting the Expanse. Irreal energies of open warp-lesion held planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, breaking the laws of being. Great depravity nested on Rykad Minoris, and it took its chance to pour out to other systems with vile glee.

Irreal energies of open warp-lesion held planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, breaking the laws of being. Great depravity nested on Rykad Minoris, and it took its chance to pour out to other systems with vile glee.

The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

languages.text: 莱卡德变成了一片腐化的疮口，不断毒害着科罗努斯扩区。在失去了恒星引力的情况下，亚空间裂隙通过超现实的能量，将所有行星凝聚在了一起，完全无视一切物理法则。无数堕落之物在小莱卡德扎下了根，带着邪恶的狂喜涌向其他星系。
languages.original_text: The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

traits.locale_text: 莱卡德变成了一片溃烂的疮口，不断腐化着科罗努斯扩区。在失去了恒星引力的情况下，亚空间裂隙通过超现实的能量，将所有行星凝聚在了一起，完全无视一切物理法则。无数堕落之物在小莱卡德扎下了根，带着邪恶的狂喜涌向其他星系。

languages.text: Das Rykad-System verwandelte sich in eine eitrige Wunde der Verderbnis, die die Ausdehnung vergiftete. Die surrealen Energien der klaffenden Warp-Wunde hielten ihre Planeten selbst ohne die Anziehungskraft des Sterns zusammen, entgegen aller grundlegenden Gesetze der Existenz. Unglaubliche Verkommenheit schlug auf Rykad Minoris Wurzeln, und sie breitete sich mit schändlicher Häme auf andere Systeme aus.
languages.original_text: The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

traits.locale_text: Das Rykad-System verwandelte sich in eine eitrige Wunde der Fäulnis, die die Ausdehnung vergiftete. Die surrealen Energien der klaffenden Warp-Wunde hielten ihre Planeten selbst ohne die Anziehungskraft des Sterns zusammen, entgegen aller grundlegenden Gesetze der Existenz. Unglaubliche Verkommenheit schlug auf Rykad Minoris Wurzeln, und sie breitete sich mit schändlicher Häme auf andere Systeme aus.

languages.text: Le système de Rykad se transforma en blessure purulente gangrénant les Étendues. Au mépris des lois mêmes de l'existence, les énergies surnaturelles de la lésion béante du Warp empêchaient les planètes de dériver, même sans l'attraction gravitationnelle de l'étoile. Une profonde dépravation s'enracina sur Rykad Minoris avant de contaminer d'autres systèmes avec une efficacité sinistre.
languages.original_text: The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

traits.locale_text: Le système de Rykad se transforma en blessure purulente déversant sa corruption sur les Étendues. Au mépris des lois mêmes de l'existence, les énergies surnaturelles de la lésion béante du Warp empêchaient les planètes de dériver, même sans l'attraction gravitationnelle de l'étoile. Une profonde dépravation s'enracina sur Rykad Minoris avant de contaminer d'autres systèmes avec une efficacité sinistre.

languages.text: El sistema Rykad se convirtió en una herida que supuraba corrupción por toda la Extensión. Las energías surrealistas de la incisión abierta del vacío mantuvieron a sus planetas unidos a pesar de la ausencia de la gravedad de su estrella, desafiando a las mismas leyes de la existencia. Una depravación colosal se apoderó de Rykad Minoris, y se extendía hacia otros sistemas con un placer retorcido.
languages.original_text: The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

traits.locale_text: El sistema Rykad se convirtió en una herida que supuraba corrupción por toda la Extensión. Las energías surrealistas de la incisión abierta del vacío mantuvieron a sus planetas unidos a pesar de la ausencia de la gravedad de su estrella, desafiando a las mismas leyes de la existencia. Una depravación colosal se apoderó de Rykad Minoris, y se extendía hacia otros sistemas con un placer retorcido.

languages.text: ライカド星系は腐敗の膿みきった傷口と化し、エクスパンスを汚染させた。そのワープレシオンの超常的なエネルギーは、星の引力がない状態でも惑星をつなぎとめ、存在の法則を無視した。計り知れない腐敗がライカド・ミノリスに根を下ろし、それは醜悪な歓喜とともに他の星系へと流れ出した。
languages.original_text: The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

traits.locale_text: ライカド星系は腐敗の膿みきった傷口と化し、エクスパンスを汚染させた。そのワープレシオンの超常的なエネルギーは、星の引力がない状態でも惑星をつなぎとめ、存在の法則を無視した。計り知れない腐敗がライカド・ミノリスに根を下ろし、それは醜悪な歓喜とともに他の星系へと流れ出した。

languages.text: Rykad Sistemi, iltihabından yozluk akan bir yaraya dönüşüp tüm Enginlik'i zehirledi. Güneşinin çekim kuvvetinden yoksun olmasına rağmen gezegenler, varoluş kanunlarını reddedip genişleyen öteboyut lezyonunun gerçeklik dışı enerjileriyle bir arada kaldı. Rykad Minoris'te muazzam bir ahlaksız kök saldı ve kötücül bir coşkuyla diğer sistemlere de sıçradı.
languages.original_text: The Rykad System turned into a purulent wound of corruption, poisoning the Expanse. The surreal energies of the yawning warp-lesion held its planets together even in the absence of the gravitational pull of the star, defying the very laws of existence. Immense depravity took root on Rykad Minoris, and it poured out into other systems with vile glee.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Sistemi yozlaşmayla dolu iltihaplı bir yaraya dönüştü ve tüm Enginlik'i zehirledi. Güneşinin çekim kuvvetinden yoksun olmasına rağmen gezegenler, genişleyen öteboyut lezyonunun gerçeklik dışı enerjileriyle, varoluş kanunlarını reddeden bir şekilde bir arada kaldılar. Rykad Minoris'te muazzam bir ahlaksız kök saldı ve kötücül bir coşkuyla diğer sistemlere de sıçradı.
